description: The error occurs when attempting to join two lists on a specified index. The lists are of different lengths and the join operation results in an 'IndexError' due to the index being out of range for one of the lists.
code:
# Create two lists 
list_1 = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
list_2 = [6, 7, 8]

# Define index to join lists
index = 5

# Join the two lists
joined_list =
